page.title: 04LANCASTER PARK
page.content: The flowers that we found there were the Vetch, Speedwell, daisy, buttercup and the clover. The actual size of the park is three hectares and it is used to play cricket. Other sports that are played are football, hockey, tennis and bowling.The Tennis courts are beside the car park and there are 4 courts. You have to be a member to play on certain courts. A club plays cricket there but anyone can play as long as you keep off the club pitch.The bowling green is private. There is a housing estate next to the park.The bowling green is surrounded by small trees.
